tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_storage_systems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    energy_in FLOAT,
    energy_out FLOAT,
    charging_strategy VARCHAR,
    discharging_strategy VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE energy_storage_systems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    storage_name VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    charge_rate DECIMAL,
    discharge_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ChargingHistory (
    charging_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    end_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    charging_session_duration INTERVAL,
    energy_added FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES BatteryInfo(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DischargingHistory (
    discharging_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    end_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    discharging_session_duration INTERVAL,
    energy_consumed FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES BatteryInfo(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    date_time TIMESTAMPTZ,
    energy_level FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    charging_status BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES BatteryInfo(battery_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ChargingRecommendations (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    battery_id UUID,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    FOREIGN KEY (battery_id) REFERENCES BatteryInfo(battery_id)
);
